function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Gender differences in the correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased housework activities leading to unexpected physical activity levels in certain population groups.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decrease in physical activity among different gender and age groups during quarantine.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Percentage increase in low active individuals during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Subjective perception of well-being during covid-19 emergency may reflect the psychological impact of the pandemic on the participants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis software may introduce errors in data interpretation and reporting.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of covid-19 through the completion of an online questionnaire.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy and data security for participants due to online questionnaire administration.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of online survey may lead to low response rate due to survey fatigue and lack of interest.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential breach of anonymity and confidentiality due to technology or human error.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical activity may ameliorate pathological outcomes of upper respiratory tract infections urti , including covid-19, by reducing excessive local inflammation and inducing the secretion of anti-inflammatory cytokines.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical activity can be effective in ameliorating mental well-being and preventing symptoms of mental health disorders such as depression and anxiety.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Examination of changes in physical activity levels during self-quarantine may provide insight into the impact of restrictions on physical activity and its correlation with individual well-being.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undesirable effects of prolonged quarantine","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term detraining due to forced stop of physical activity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 epidemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through droplet and close contact","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contamination through bodily fluids and transmission through oral or conjunctival routes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of infectiousness changes over time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of bio-sensors and smart sanitation technology in infrastructure and sanitation products.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through community wastewater","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on wbe as the sole surveillance tool","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated wastewater with pathogens","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand for the health system and availability of intensive care","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control measures of social protection and economic package","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-boundary and cross-sectoral transmission of covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater management and treatment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant reduction in park attendance in district 1 due to low amount of residents in the district, which is mostly touristic and financial.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent variable is infection ratio","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in mosquito-borne diseases due to excess vegetation and green zones","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thermal discomfort in tropical countries due to excessive vegetal mass","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Varied effectiveness of greening strategies in different climatic conditions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of malaria vector to new geographical areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge of key epidemiological drivers for urban vector-borne diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing urbanization and growth of urban mosquito vector species","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heat island effect in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of invasive mosquito vectors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of novel arboviruses into new areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban malaria transmission and adaptation of mosquito vectors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of viruses like zika and chikungunya across 73 countries and leading to public health emergencies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of invasive mosquito species competent for arbovirus transmission, including zika and chikungunya","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased local temperatures due to urbanization leading to higher incidence of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue, zika, and yellow fever","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate-associated changes in precipitation disproportionately affecting urban and rural environments in terms of mosquito oviposition sites","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in estimating urban mosquito species distributions and abundance, leading to poor estimation of urban disease exposure","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global warming leading to an increased burden of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization and increased international travel enabling the importation of invasive mosquito vectors and pathogens","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Temperature modifications influencing the epidemic potential of mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in heat-related deaths due to hotter days and more frequent heatwaves","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and cardio-vascular disease due to particulate matter and wildfires","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
